alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 4:06PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Elbert, eastern Arapahoe, southern Washington and northeastern Lincoln Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 405 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Cottonwood Valley, or 24 miles north of Limon, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Deer Trail, Thurman, Arickaree School, Cope, Anton, Woodlin School, Agate, Cottonwood Valley, Lindon and Last Chance. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Washington County
